microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase

Class PostableServiceAgent<TRequest,TResult extends ServiceResult>

  • java.lang.Object
    • microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase.ServiceAgent<TResult>
      • microsoft.hawaii.hawaiiClientLibraryBase.PostableServiceAgent<TRequest,TResult>
  • Type Parameters:
    TRequest - Generic request type
    TResult - Generic service result type which inherits ServiceResult type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateAgent, DeleteByKeysAgent, GetByKeysAgent, SetAgent, SpeechRecognitionAgent

    public abstract class PostableServiceAgent<TRequest,TResult extends ServiceResult>
extends ServiceAgent<TResult>
    Base class for all Hawaii service agent classes which need to post data to Hawaii server
